name: NATIXIS
membership: ESBG & EACB (via BPCE), EBF through FBF, EFAMA (via Natixis Investment Management), Insurance Europe through FFA (via Natixis Assurances), AFEP, AMAFI, AFME, ISDA, ICMA.
